revision.text: Possibly: Roman antiquities; or, a description of the manners and customs of the Romans; in their Government, Magistracy, Laws, Judicial Proceedings, Religion, Games, Military & Naval Affairs, Dress, Exercises, Baths, Marriages, Funerals, Weights & Measures, Coins, Houses, Gardens, Agriculture, Carriages, Public Buildings, &c, &c. Designed chiefly to Illustrate the Latin Classics. By Alexander Adam, LL.D. Rector of the High School of Edinburgh. (Edinburgh : Printed for A. Strahan, and T. Cadell, London; and William Creech, Edinburgh, MDCCXCI. [1791]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2437115~S1
